snippet: Khaled al-Qazzaz, who was the foreign relations secretary and a top adviser of the Muslim Brotherhood, had been held without charges for 558 days.
abstract: Egyptian authorities release Khaled al-Qazzaz, foreign relations secretary and adviser to ousted Pres Mohamed Morsi, who was detained with him during military takeover in July 2013.
lead_paragraph: Khaled al-Qazzaz, who was the foreign relations secretary and a top adviser of the Muslim Brotherhood, had been held without charges for 558 days.

headline.main: Egyptian Authorities Release a Morsi Adviser
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Authorities Release One of Detained Morsi Advisers
